dialogs.displayName: 3. After applied the service, how can I read the statement? - e-Statement - Ans: - Loan - Personal Internet Banking

web.content:
**3.  After applied the service, how can I read the statement?**
  

Ans: After applied the service, we will send an alert email to your registered email address when there is new e-Statement. And you can read and download the new e-statement via Personal Internet Banking ("e-Statement"> ”View
  

e-Statement” in horizontal menu, or under “Electronic Services”>"e-Statement"> ” View e-Statement” in vertical menu).
